landing.bio: I´m WEB UI developer. My tech stack includes Javascript, CSS, Node and React. Node for server side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend. I have also worked with Java, .Net, Wordpress and MySql. I am the Tech Lead to the ABC, FX and NatGeo web sites on Globant as a contractor for Disney.

experience.position: Tech lead, Migrate FX and NatGeo web app to React js.
experience.aboutWork: Working as a Front-End developer for Disney as a Contractor

experience.position: Tech lead, Migrate ABC web app to React js.
experience.aboutWork: Working as a Front-End developer for Disney as a Contractor
Full Stack Developer, cloud computing and linux administrator.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time riding my motorcycle.
interests.paragraphTwo: I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
